structure.unit: LIQUEFIED PETROLEUM GAS AND OTHER FLAMMABLE LIQUIDS

law.catch_line: Prohibited use of tanks having common outlet on manifold.
law.text: In the event that compartments of a tank vehicle are connected to a common outlet or manifold, no compartment so connected shall contain Class A liquids while any other compartment so connected contains Class B liquids.
law.history: Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 6, effective June 17, 1954.
